node.name: exc_02_01
node.code:
# Load libraries
suppressMessages(library(neotoma2))

# Get a site
site <- get_sites(__)
site

node.name: exc_02_02
node.code:
# Load libraries
suppressMessages(library(neotoma2))

# Get multiple sites
site <- get_sites(c(_))
site

node.name: exc_02_03
node.code:
# Load libraries
suppressMessages(library(neotoma2))

# Get a site
site <- get_sites(sitename = "Alex%")
site

sites[[1]]$_______

node.name: exc_02_06

# Get a site
sites <- get_sites(altmin = -30, altmax = 0, sitename = "Lake%")

# Using dplyr and neotoma2

as.____.frame(____)$_____

node.name: solution_02_06
node.code:
# Load libraries
suppressMessages(library(neotoma2))
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))

# Get a site
sites <- get_sites(altmin = -30, altmax = 0, sitename = "Lake%")

# Using dplyr and neotoma2
# get all ids
as.data.frame(sites)$siteid
